Registration Information

Registration Form

Here.

Important Note: If you're using the bank transfer method of payment, there's a field which says Message to appear on payee's statement. You should put your full name in this field.

Registration Deadlines

Deadlines:

  • Early registration closes 9 November, 5pm (extended deadline).
  • General registration closing date is 30 November.
  • The local organisers will be accepting accommodation bookings until 16 November.

Registration Costs

Workshop Registration Early Regular
Student presenter free 30
Other student 30 60
Regular 225 260

Tutorial Registration Early Regular
Student free 30
Regular 70 110

Some Freebies

  • One student presenter per paper gets one night free accommodation.
  • There's a free social evening on Monday. (This is followed by a non-free dinner.)

Notes

We'd advise booking accommodation early, as it's filling up.

Enquiries

The Australasian Language Technology Workshop is being organised by ALTA, the Australasian Language Technology Association.

For any comments or questions about the workshop please contact the organizers (workshop AT alta DOT asn DOT au).
